author: FGM
description: A NPM version of percolate:server-info for Meteor 1.6+
name: meteor_server_info

scripts.compile: rm -rf lib/* ; meteor npm i && meteor npm run test-compile
scripts.cover: meteor npm run test-compile && time -p istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register test/**/*
scripts.test: meteor npm run test-compile && time -p mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register test/*
scripts.test-integration: meteor npm run test-compile && time -p mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register test/integration
scripts.test-unit: meteor npm run test-compile && time -p mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register test/unit
